item.title: About Me
item.description: I am a final-year M.Tech student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar. My research focuses on Performance Optimization and Usable Privacy & Security. Before joining IIT Gandhinagar, I completed my M.Sc in Computer Science from the University of Kalyani, where I worked on solving Facility Location problems using meta-heuristic algorithms. Prior to that, I earned a B.Sc (Honours) in Computer Science from West Bengal State University, where I tried to sneak into Reversible Computing.
